title: Launcher problems PLSS HELP!
body: Whenever i click on "Launch", the client crashes. idk whats wrong and i cant find a solution online.

replies.body:
Are you getting any kind of error message specifically or does the client just.....never appear? If you just don't ever see the client open, try updating your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and running the game as admin. 

If that's not the case, let me know what kind of error or crash you're seeing so I know what's going on.
when i click Launch on the patcher, it closes and the main client never opens. Not even an error pops up. I've tried running it as admin but that didn't seem to fix it either.
K nvm i fixed it. I ended up just uninstalling it completely and redownloaded the newest installer since my old installer was the 2016 version. Thank you for taking time out of your day too help tho!

Sounds like a permissions issue for sure. You most likely reinstalling with admin privileges this time which got everything working, there's not any differences in the installers you downloaded but glad it's working now! Keep the steps in that [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) handy in case this happens again, just be sure to do all the steps in that guide.
